text: Ami e granthe tadera prati likhe diyechi ye, pranera binimaye prana, caksura binimaye caksu, nakera binimaye naka, kanera binimaye kana, damtera binimaye damta ebam yakhama samuhera binimaye samana yakhama. Atahpara ye ksama kare, se gonaha theke paka haye yaya. Yesaba loka allaha ya abatirna karechena, tadanuyayi phayasala kare na tara'i jalema.
